WNAM: Western North America, ENAM: Eastern North America, WEU: Western Europe, EEU: Eastern Europe, NSAM: Northern South America, SSAM: Southern South America, OC: Oceania, ME: Middle East, NAF: North Africa, SAF: South Africa, SAS: Southern Asia, SEAS: South East Asia, NEAS: North East Asia)
